thread.title: Trump will make school safety top priority: Pence

title: Trump will make school safety top priority: Pence
text:
Trump will make school safety top priority: Pence 7:41pm GMT - 02:26 
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence says the Trump administration will focus on improving school safety and giving law enforcement the tools they need to deal with people struggling from dangerous mental illness. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
